translated: the recollection.🔽The caṇḍālī yoga is in all the limbs,

analyzed: yan lag thams cad la yang ste/_khyad par 'jug pa/_srog rtshol la ni/
translated: the special entry,🔽the karma caṇḍālī in the search for the life-force,🔽the dharma caṇḍālī in the retention,🔽and the gnosis caṇḍālī in the recollection and samādhi.

original: las kyi gtum mo'o/_/'dzin pa la ni chos kyi gtum mo'o/_/rjes dran dang ting nge 'dzin dag gi ye shes kyi gtum mo'o/_/thams cad kyang lhan cig skyes
analyzed: las kyi gtum mo'o/_/'dzin pa la ni chos kyi gtum mo'o/_/rjes dran dang ting nge 'dzin dag gi ye shes kyi gtum mo'o/_/thams cad kyang lhan cig skyes
translated: All of those are the yoga of the connate,🔽the first joy is the joy itself,

original: pa'i rnal 'byor te/_dga' ba dang po dga' bo nyid/_/mchog tu dga' ba rnal
analyzed: pa'i rnal 'byor te/_dga' ba dang po dga' bo nyid/_/mchog tu dga' ba rnal
translated: the supreme joy is the yoginī,

original: 'byor ma/_/shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/_/de de'i thabs las yang
analyzed: 'byor ma/_/shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/_/de de'i thabs las yang
translated: and the joy of all joys is ascertained to be connate.🔽Joy is a slight bliss,

original: dag rig_/dga' bas bde ba cung zad de/_/mchog tu dga' ba de las
analyzed: dag rig_/dga' bas bde ba cung zad de/_/mchog tu dga' ba de las
translated: supreme joy is greater than that,

original: lhag_/dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin/_/mchog tu dga' ba srid
analyzed: lhag_/dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin/_/mchog tu dga' ba srid
translated: the joy of separation from joy is free from attachment,🔽and supreme joy is said to be existence.🔽Separation from joy is nirvāṇa,

original: par brjod/_/dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das/_/dbu ma dga' ba tsham nyid
analyzed: par brjod/_/dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das/_/dbu ma dga' ba tsham nyid
translated: and the middle joy is the connate.

original: do/'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs/_/ces pa ni/_snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang /_snang ba nye bar thob pas mtshhon pa'i/_dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /_khyad par gyi dga' ba'i gnas pa rnams so/_/lhag
analyzed: do/'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs/_/ces pa ni/_snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang /_snang ba nye bar thob pas mtshhon pa'i/_dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /_khyad par gyi dga' ba'i gnas pa rnams so/_/lhag
translated: This refers to the abiding in the joy, supreme joy, and special joy, which are characterized by appearance, increase of appearance, and attainment of appearance.

original: ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/_/ces pas ni lhan skyes kyi gnas pa'o/_/'dod
analyzed: ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/_/ces pas ni lhan skyes kyi gnas pa'o/_/'dod
translated: The remaining line, “The connate joy itself,” refers to the connate abiding.

original: chags med cing chags bral med/_/dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: chags med cing chags bral med/_/dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
translated: The line, “There is no passion, no absence of passion, and no observation of a middle,”

original: 'di la thabs dang shes rab med/_/yang dag de nyid snang ba po/_/ces pa ni/
analyzed: 'di la thabs dang shes rab med/_/yang dag de nyid snang ba po/_/ces pa ni/
translated: refers to the line, “Here there is no method and wisdom, but it is the appearance of the true reality.”🔽This refers to the abiding of manifest awakening.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas pa'o/_/gsum po spangs pa kho na las/_/lhan
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas pa'o/_/gsum po spangs pa kho na las/_/lhan
translated: The line, “It is said that the connate is awakening only from the rejection of the three,”

original: cig skyes pa byang chub brjod/_/yang na de nyid thams cad bdag_/yang na
analyzed: cig skyes pa byang chub brjod/_/yang na de nyid thams cad bdag_/yang na
translated: refers to the line, “Or it is the self of all of those, or it is completely rejected by all.”

original: kun gyis rnam par spangs/_/ces pa 'dis ni mngon par byang chub pa chen po'i
analyzed: kun gyis rnam par spangs/_/ces pa 'dis ni mngon par byang chub pa chen po'i
translated: This refers to the great manifest awakening.

original: gnas pa bstan pa yin no/_/dbye ba lhag ma ni 'dir ma bstan no/_/slob
analyzed: gnas pa bstan pa yin no/_/dbye ba lhag ma ni 'dir ma bstan no/_/slob
translated: The teaching of the abiding is complete. The remaining divisions are not taught here.

original: dpon snga mas mi gsal bar/_/byas gang go ba'i phyir brjod de/_/nyung ngur
analyzed: dpon snga mas mi gsal bar/_/byas gang go ba'i phyir brjod de/_/nyung ngur
translated: The master [Buddhajñānapāda] has clarified what was not clear in the earlier [commentaries] in order to be understood.

original: 'dod pa de dag la/_/'dir ni khyad par gsal por phye/_/ces pa slob
analyzed: 'dod pa de dag la/_/'dir ni khyad par gsal por phye/_/ces pa slob
translated: Here, the distinctions are clearly drawn for those who desire a brief [explanation].

original: dpon chen po dpal ldan bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes nye bar sbyar ba/_dges pa rdo
analyzed: dpon chen po dpal ldan bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes nye bar sbyar ba/_dges pa rdo
translated: This was composed by the great master Śrī Maṇḍalavajra.

original: rje'i snying po rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs sbyor ba mdor bsdus zhes bya ba
analyzed: rje'i snying po rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs sbyor ba mdor bsdus zhes bya ba
translated: The Sādhana of the Completion Stage of the Essence of Hevajra, Called the Condensed Practice🔽is complete.

original: rdzogs so//_// yul gu dzi ra ta'i mkhas pa chen po pun+na badzra las zhus te/_rgyal khams
analyzed: rdzogs so//_// yul gu dzi ra ta'i mkhas pa chen po pun+na badzra las zhus te/_rgyal khams
translated: Requested from the great scholar of Gujarat, Punnavajra,🔽and translated by the king

original: pa ta ra na thas bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: pa ta ra na thas bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: of Patan.

original: sbyor ba mdor bsdus zhes bya ba/
analyzed: sbyor ba mdor bsdus zhes bya ba/
translated: The Condensed Practice, Called the Condensed Practice
